title: Andersonville National Historic Site: Volunteer Housing
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Volunteer     Volunteer Housing              Volunteer Housing       Contact the Volunteer Coordinator at 229 924-0343 or e-mail us for more information. RV Sites:  Full hookups (electricity, water, sewer) Electric is 30/50 amp Shared washer & dryer  Guest House:  Studio apartment style Guest Cottage Fully accessible facility Shared washer & dryer  Mail Received at: Andersonville National Historic Site 496 Cemetery Road Andersonville, GA 31711  Commitment:   Length of stay - New volunteers minimum two months to complete training. Returning volunteers negotiable. At least 32 hours per week, per person (four 8-hour days, or partial days to total 32 hours).
